name: XP Inc.
description: XP Inc. is a leading financial services firm based in Brazil, specializing in investment brokerage, asset management, and financial education. Founded in 2001 by Guilherme Benchimol and a group of entrepreneurs, XP has transformed the Brazilian investment landscape by democratizing access to financial markets for individual investors. The company offers a robust platform that provides a wide range of investment products, including stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and exchange-traded funds (ETFs). XP is known for its innovative technology, user-friendly interface, and commitment to financial education, helping clients make informed investment decisions. With a focus on transparency and client-centric services, XP has grown rapidly, attracting millions of customers and becoming one of the most recognized brands in the financial sector in Brazil. As of its IPO in December 2019, XP continues to expand its offerings and reach, aiming to empower more Brazilians to invest and secure their financial future.
